entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Target company. Articque’s software relies on a scalable SaaS architecture.

entities.name: Articque's software
entities.description: General term for Articque's software offerings, relies on a scalable SaaS architecture.

entities.name: CDO
entities.description: Web application deployable on Windows servers. Composed of: Data Base (PostgreSQL in replacement of MySQL for rights, accounts, user roles and file management), .Net 4.8 Web Service and its API (performing spatial/statistical calculation, generating map representations and exports), and Symphony/PHP/Apache Web Application (making up the user interface and the map rendering engine in a browser).

entities.name: AP
entities.description: Web application deployable on Windows servers. Composed of: Data Base (PostgreSQL in replacement of MySQL for rights, accounts, user roles and file management), .Net 4.8 Web Service and its API (performing spatial/statistical calculation, generating map representations and exports), and Symphony/PHP/Apache Web Application (making up the user interface and the map rendering engine in a browser).

entities.name: Articque Platform
entities.description: Core backend platform offered by Articque, as shown in the architecture diagram.

entities.name: C&D Online
entities.description: Product or brand associated with Articque's platform offerings, logo shown with Articque Platform.

entities.name: Platform Web Service
entities.description: Core web service component of the Articque Platform.

entities.name: Articque Library
entities.description: Library component of the Platform Web Service.

entities.name: Platform Library
entities.description: Library component of the Platform Web Service.

entities.name: Platform API
entities.description: API component of the Platform Web Service, used for interactions.

entities.name: Geocoding
entities.description: Additional module for the Articque Platform.

entities.name: Geoservice Data
entities.description: Additional module for the Articque Platform.

entities.name: Basemaps
entities.description: Additional module for the Articque Platform.

entities.name: SaaS
entities.description: Scalable SaaS architecture.

entities.name: PostgreSQL
entities.description: Used for Data Base; for rights, accounts, user roles and file management. In replacement of MySQL.

entities.name: MySQL
entities.description: Previously used for Data Base, replaced by PostgreSQL.

entities.name: .Net 4.8
entities.description: Technology used by the .Net 4.8 Web Service. Also referred to as Framework .net 4.8 in diagram for Platform Web Service.

entities.name: API
entities.description: Application Programming Interface, specifically mentioned for the .Net 4.8 Web Service.

entities.name: Symphony
entities.description: PHP framework, version v4.4 shown in diagram.

entities.name: PHP
entities.description: Scripting language, version v8 shown in diagram.

entities.name: Apache
entities.description: Web server, version v2 shown in diagram.

entities.name: Leaflet
entities.description: JavaScript library for interactive maps, used in Frontend.

entities.name: ReactJS
entities.description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces, used in Frontend.

entities.name: JavaScript
entities.description: Programming language for web development, used in Frontend.

entities.name: .NET Framework .net 4.8
entities.description: Microsoft software framework, used by Platform Web Service.

entities.name: Proxy
entities.description: Intermediary server/service shown in architecture diagram between Web Application and Platform Web Service.

entities.name: ChapsVision
entities.description: Company mentioned in relation to Project Inuk.
